resources.string: Your shows collection is currently empty.\n\nVisit Discover tab to add your first show.
Your Watchlist is currently empty.\n\nVisit Discover tab to add shows you might want to watch in the future.

Your Archive is currently empty.

Archive is a list of shows that have been dropped, abandoned or you are no longer interested in.

Archived shows will no longer appear in Progress, Discover and My Shows sections and will also be skipped during Trakt.tv import.
